version_description:
*** iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！会闪退！正在紧急修复中！
*** iOS8和iOS9的用户请放心升级。

1.推出英简繁三种语言版本。台港澳和国外的朋友们，你们的声音我们听到了！
2.只要手机有联网，即使不开启手机定位，也可以收到彩云的天气预报了。不过嘛，网络定位肯定不如手机定位收到的预报精确啦~
3.修正了一些虽然不大，但是却会影响用户体验的bug，比如：下拉刷新后页面会有几个像素的偏差，更换了几个有用户说不太好理解的图标，让你使用起来更顺手！
4.升级了高德地图，新版地图那个小清新的范儿，跟彩云的UI是一样一样的...

*** iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！会闪退！正在紧急修复中！
*** iOS8和iOS9的用户请放心升级。

1.推出英简繁三种语言版本。台港澳和国外的朋友们，你们的声音我们听到了！
2.只要手机有联网，即使不开启手机定位，也可以收到彩云的天气预报了。不过嘛，网络定位肯定不如手机定位收到的预报精确啦~
3.修正了一些虽然不大，但是却会影响用户体验的bug，比如：下拉刷新后页面会有几个像素的偏差，更换了几个有用户说不太好理解的图标，让你使用起来更顺手！
4.升级了高德地图，新版地图那个小清新的范儿，跟彩云的UI是一样一样的...

*** iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！iOS7的用户不要升级！会闪退！正在紧急修复中！
*** iOS8和iOS9的用户请放心升级。

1.推出英简繁三种语言版本。台港澳和国外的朋友们，你们的声音我们听到了！
2.只要手机有联网，即使不开启手机定位，也可以收到彩云的天气预报了。不过嘛，网络定位肯定不如手机定位收到的预报精确啦~
3.修正了一些虽然不大，但是却会影响用户体验的bug，比如：下拉刷新后页面会有几个像素的偏差，更换了几个有用户说不太好理解的图标，让你使用起来更顺手！
4.升级了高德地图，新版地图那个小清新的范儿，跟彩云的UI是一样一样的...
紧急修复了iOS7系统上会闪退的bug！
紧急修复了iOS7系统上会闪退的bug！
紧急修复了iOS7系统上会闪退的bug！

需要watchOS 2.2及以上版本，才能在苹果手表上运行彩云天气哦。
1.Apple Watch来啦：不但可以查看未来2小时分钟级的天气预报，而且彩云可以支持直接在表盘上显示天气，并且还可以时间旅行哦！支持watchOS 2.2。
2.可以把炫酷的雷达动画分享给朋友们啦，欢迎测试我们新的分享功能~~
3.不开启定位服务，也可以使用上次定位位置获得天气数据。
4.定位服务增加“使用期间”定位选项。

1.针对iOS10，对Today Widget进行了适配和改版，增加了分钟级降雨量曲线和未来三天天气的预报，看彩云预报更方便啦。。。
2.降雨图标可以区分大雨、中雨和小雨了

1. Added typhoon-track-map function which shows everything you should know about the typhoon including class, speed, intensity and path. 
2. Added data about thunderstorms, our map can now show the real-time location of thunderstorms and lightnings.
3. Added weather GIF sharing function.
4. Increased the forecast period of down-to-the-minute rainfall from 1 hour to 2 hours.
5. Added down-to-the-hour wind speed and direction forecast data.
6. Added detailed air pollution information.
7. Added dynamic background images.
8. Completely new UI installed.
9. Fixed many bugs for a smoother user experience.

we withdraw a location-related bug-fix
P.S. ColorfulClouds was supposed to work only when location feature was enabled. Recently a bug allowed users to use ColorfulClouds after disabling location. We had fixed it and released the fix in the last version, but many users think it useful. So we just issue this special version to recover the lovely bug.

The colorful cloud weather is coming!

1. New data such as air pressure, visibility, cloud cover and short wave radiation flux are added
2. Add map legend and satellite map setting
3. Add SVIP super members, including 3 kinds of satellite cloud pictures, 5 kinds of weather forecast moving pictures, etc
4. Pro users can get exclusive discount on membership page: 0 yuan for 365 days Super member
5. Invite a friend to join the activity. Invite a friend to register for Caiyun weather and become a super member

After upgrading to 6.0, all rights of the previous Pro 5.0 will remain unaffected and still be used. The new in-store feature is the forecast map and satellite map, which is free to all pro users for one year and can be claimed in the member center.

1. Update ios14 widget
Add 2 types of small components: weather forecast (4 * 2), radar rainfall map (3 sizes)  
Add 2 themes: follow the weather, follow system (light, dark mode)  
Optimize widget content and fix some display problems
2. New mobile phone number one key login function
3. Adjustment of typhoon card display (the latest typhoon dynamic can be viewed through map page - more - Typhoon)
4. Fix known problems

1. Optimize ios14 desktop widget
[follow the weather] the color matching has been upgraded to adapt to the dark night mode with more weather phenomena
[real time weather] provides rich data selection
[weather forecast] the day by day / hour mode can be switched at will, and the time of sunrise and sunset will be more indicated
[air quality index] supports the display of specific AQI values
[radar rainfall map] the display range is more flexible: from small streets to the whole country (continent)
2. Fix known problems

1. Optimize ios14 desktop widget
[follow the weather] the color matching has been upgraded to adapt to the dark night mode with more weather phenomena
[real time weather] provides rich data selection
[weather forecast] the day by day / hour mode can be switched at will, and the time of sunrise and sunset will be more indicated
